imdb.plot outline: Underprivileged teenagers realize and pursue their dream of becoming fashion designers, by going through intense training in the Couture Charité boot-camp and competing with each other for the best designs in order to obtain formal education and a career sponsorship from major fashion brands and celebrities who own their clothing line.
imdb.title: Fashion Dreams
plot: Underprivileged teenagers realize and pursue their dream of becoming fashion designers, by going through intense training in the Couture Charité boot-camp and competing with each other for the best designs in order to obtain formal education and a career sponsorship from major fashion brands and celebrities who own their clothing line.::Mike Dudko
